mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_video_course ( classifyId, teacherId, subjectId, managerId, teacher, title, content, frontCover, subcontent, hit, years, beikaochongci_type, courseSort, frontcover1, isAccept, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{classifyId}, #{teacherId}, #{subjectId}, #{managerId}, #{teacher}, #{title}, #{content}, #{frontCover}, #{subcontent}, #{hit}, #{years}, #{beikaochongciType}, #{courseSort}, #{frontcover1}, #{isAccept}, #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_video_course ( classifyId, teacherId, subjectId, managerId, teacher, title, content, frontCover, subcontent, hit, years, beikaochongci_type, courseSort, frontcover1, isAccept, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.classifyId}, #{map.teacherId}, #{map.subjectId}, #{map.managerId}, #{map.teacher}, #{map.title}, #{map.content}, #{map.frontCover}, #{map.subcontent}, #{map.hit}, #{map.years}, #{map.beikaochongciType}, #{map.courseSort}, #{map.frontcover1}, #{map.isAccept}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_video_course
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND classifyId like CONCAT('%', #{classifyId} , '%')
AND teacherId like CONCAT('%', #{teacherId} , '%')
AND subjectId like CONCAT('%', #{subjectId} , '%')
AND managerId like CONCAT('%', #{managerId} , '%')
AND teacher like CONCAT('%', #{teacher} , '%')
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{title} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{content} , '%')
AND frontCover like CONCAT('%', #{frontCover} , '%')
AND subcontent like CONCAT('%', #{subcontent} , '%')
AND hit like CONCAT('%', #{hit} , '%')
AND years like CONCAT('%', #{years} , '%')
AND beikaochongci_type like CONCAT('%', #{beikaochongciType} , '%')
AND courseSort like CONCAT('%', #{courseSort} , '%')
AND frontcover1 like CONCAT('%', #{frontcover1} , '%')
AND isAccept like CONCAT('%', #{isAccept} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
